SEARCH
Package com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel

Class NoContextConfigChannel<P extends net.minecraft.network.protocol.common.custom.CustomPacketPayload>

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel.NoContextConfigChannel<P>
Type Parameters:
P - the type of payload this channel sends and receives.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Channel, ConfigChannel, NoContextChannel<P>
public class NoContextConfigChannel<P extends net.minecraft.network.protocol.common.custom.CustomPacketPayload> extends Object implements ConfigChannel, NoContextChannel<P>
Describes a CustomPacketPayload channel that can have payloads sent and received during the 'configuration' phase.

      public static <P extends net.minecraft.network.protocol.common.custom.CustomPacketPayload> NoContextConfigChannel<P> of(@NotNull net.minecraft.network.protocol.common.custom.CustomPacketPayload.Type<P> id, @NotNull @NotNull net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<? super NetByteBuf,P> codec)
      Creates a new context-less channel.
      Type Parameters:
      P - the type of payload.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of this channel. Must be the same as the id of the payloads being sent.
      codec - used for converting packets into payloads.
      Returns:
      a new context-less channel.
